What do i do?

I am a software developer.

Officially, A software developer is a person concerned with facets of the software development process, including the research, design, programming, and testing of computer software.

But really? I love to help people using every bit of programming knowledge i have to make a difference. Be it just making a small microsite to bring fun and laughter, or be part of a large scale software development team to bring meaningful technology into the society. Which really means, anything works as long as i can make someone's life better.
